articles.description: Cate Campbell said the 'hysteria' surrounding the doping case had damaged the young swimmer, who has been given the green light to return to the pool next year.
articles.content:
"Ive been with her the whole way. The costs, the financial and emotional toll is incredible its beyond comprehension. I was shocked at how damaging it all was and it seemed to get worse every time.

articles.content:
